attributes.review: us people in generation z are trying to make a difference in tik tok but since we are actually doing it trump wants to put a stop to it by banning tik tok if we can get this app to a 1 star review in average this app will be deleted let’s do something
attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♂️🧚‍♀️🌿🌱🌴🌳🌷TRUMP 2020🍄🍁🍁🥀🌲🌷🌴🌱🌷🧚‍♂️🧚‍♀️✨... but on a grave

attributes.review: This app is so unbelievably racist i downloaded this app too see reason to vote for president trump again but u simply can’t find any reason this is a horrible app and needs to be taken down immediately.
attributes.title: terrible app

attributes.review: Claims to love freedom but only when it’s in his favor. Taking down tiktok is censorship and very unconstitutional, the fact that he claims to believe in freedom is astounding. Telling people you can’t speak Spanish this is America for 1 is xenophobic but 2 is anti-freedom of speech. Very hypocritical.
attributes.title: Very hypocritical

attributes.review: This app is the worst app to exist. Idk what the point of it is. After reading the rest of the reviews I knew I should of deleted as soon as I got it . This app made my phone glitch hella and WHY TF WOULD YOU HAVE AN APP LIKE THIS. Well bye. Ima go play subways surfers. An app that can actually entertain me.
attributes.title: Nasty

attributes.review: I was trying to support my president and so I downloaded the app and it made my phone GLITCH and it leaked all of the celebrities nudes that I have collected. That’s not all it also deleted most of my apps and made the screen glitch MULTIPLE times🤢🙄☹️
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: i originally downloaded the app to see what people see in this president and to see if maybe i was missing something but i really was not. this app is not that good honestly and it does not justice for him or his campaign. honestly if i could give it 0 stars i would. and for some reason the app kept glitching like i kept seeing the annoying orange pop up on the app all of a sudden. the app overall is just not it at all.
attributes.title: usless

attributes.review: My grandma can’t afford healthcare so she had Obama care when the pumpkin we call trump took it away she had no health insurance. She had a heart attack and died because we didn’t have healthcare so they couldn’t help her.
attributes.title: He has to be stopped

attributes.review: My phone cracked after I said his name the creature that is trying to take tiktok away from me like no honey our group is bigger the tiktok squads will always when we have each other’s back✌🏼✌🏼
attributes.title: Don’t download

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it brought so much bad luck my way. This app should be deleted so it can help my stress go away!!! It brought cockroaches, bees, ants, ticks, and so much more bad luck. and the worst for last my HUSBAND broke up with me for downloading this app!!!!!! 😣😣😭😭😭🥺🥺😔😔😓😓😓
attributes.title: worst app ever!

attributes.review: It took 1 whole week to install plus when I opened it, it had a virus that showed weird stuff like porn, little kids and trump’s nudes!!😡😡 I needed to put bleach on my eyes after seeing that.
attributes.title: This app almost gave me cancer 😡
